title: Ariana Grande wants to sample Kylie Jenner singing to Stormi
text:
We need Ari’s sample of Rise and Shine (Picture: Kylie Jenner, YouTube)

It seems no one is loving Kylie Jenner singing more than Ariana Grande, who has joked she wants to sample the reality star’s viral lullaby.

A clip of Kylie, 22, singing Rise and Shine to her daughter Stormi has taken the internet by storm with most unaware of the TV star’s hidden vocal talents.

Pop superstar Ariana, 26, caught wind of the meme and it’s safe to say she’s also impressed with Kylie’s vibrato.

Even if it lasted just a few seconds.

Reacting to the clip, Ariana posted a video of her singing Kylie’s rendition of Rise and Shine, with the caption: ‘@kyliejenner can i sample [sic].’

Erm, as if she needed to ask. Well, she probably did to avoid copyright issues.

But Kylie immediately gave Ariana the go ahead and replied: ‘Yes, yes you can @arianagrande. As long as I’m in music video.. [sic].’

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

It sounds as though Kylie is coming for her mum’s crown after Kris Jenner starred in the music video for Ariana’s 2018 single Thank U, Next as the ‘cool mum’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Watch out for a Ky and Ari collaboration coming in 2020.

Kylie’s secret musical talents were revealed in her office tour video posted to YouTube last week.

Towards the end of the 16-minute video, Kylie walks over to Stormi’s personal bedroom in the sprawling Californian office. After turning on the lights, Kylie finds the toddler sitting up in her crib before gently singing: ‘Rise and shine.’

The brief clip went viral and Kylie has become one of the best memes of 2019 – she made it just in time with only two months left.

One fan asked on Twitter: ‘How do I set Kylie Jenner singing “rise and shine” as my alarm tone in the morning?’

‘Kylie singing “rise and shine” had truly changed me in ways I cannot explain,’ another fan praised.

And it seems the cosmetics mogul is absolutely lapping up the entertainment, as she shared a brilliant meme of her face in the middle of the Teletubby sun on Instagram.

‘No caption needed,’ she jokingly told her followers.

description: Ariana Grande sang Kylie Jenner's viral song Rise and Shine and wants to sample the brilliant lullaby.
